members.name: dismiss
members.descriptionHtml: Forces the panel to dismiss.

members.name: open
members.descriptionHtml: Forces the panel to open.

tables.name: IPanelHeaderRenderer
tables.descriptionHtml: Renderer function which takes an additional parameter, the ID to use for the element containing the panel's title. This allows the `aria-labelledby` for the panel popup to work correctly. Note that if `headerTextId` is provided, it **must** be used on an element, or screen readers will be confused by the reference to a nonexistent ID.

members.name: className
members.descriptionHtml: Additional css class to apply to the Panel

members.name: closeButtonAriaLabel
members.descriptionHtml: Aria label on close button

members.name: componentId
members.descriptionHtml: Deprecated property. Serves no function.

members.name: componentRef
members.descriptionHtml: Optional callback to access the IPanel interface. Use this instead of ref for accessing the public methods and properties of the component.

members.name: customWidth
members.descriptionHtml: Custom panel width, used only when `type` is set to `PanelType.custom`.

members.name: elementToFocusOnDismiss
members.descriptionHtml: Sets the HTMLElement to focus on when exiting the FocusTrapZone.
members.defaultValue: The element.target that triggered the Panel.

members.name: firstFocusableSelector
members.descriptionHtml: Indicates the selector for first focusable item. Deprecated, use `focusTrapZoneProps`.

members.name: focusTrapZoneProps
members.descriptionHtml: Optional props to pass to the FocusTrapZone component to manage focus in the panel.

members.name: forceFocusInsideTrap
members.descriptionHtml: Indicates whether Panel should force focus inside the focus trap zone. If not explicitly specified, behavior aligns with FocusTrapZone's default behavior. Deprecated, use `focusTrapZoneProps`.

members.name: hasCloseButton
members.descriptionHtml: Has the close button visible.

members.name: headerClassName
members.descriptionHtml: Optional parameter to provider the class name for header text

members.name: headerText
members.descriptionHtml: Header text for the Panel.

members.name: ignoreExternalFocusing
members.descriptionHtml: Indicates if this Panel will ignore keeping track of HTMLElement that activated the Zone. Deprecated, use `focusTrapZoneProps`.

members.name: isBlocking
members.descriptionHtml: Whether the panel uses a modal overlay or not

members.name: isFooterAtBottom
members.descriptionHtml: Determines if content should stretch to fill available space putting footer at the bottom of the page

members.name: isHiddenOnDismiss
members.descriptionHtml: Whether the panel is hidden on dismiss, instead of destroyed in the DOM. Protects the contents from being destroyed when the panel is dismissed.

members.name: isLightDismiss
members.descriptionHtml: Whether the panel can be light dismissed.

members.name: isOpen
members.descriptionHtml: Whether the panel is displayed.

members.name: layerProps
members.descriptionHtml: Optional props to pass to the Layer component hosting the panel.

members.name: onDismiss
members.descriptionHtml: A callback function for when the panel is closed, before the animation completes. If the panel should NOT be dismissed based on some keyboard event, then simply call ev.preventDefault() on it

members.name: onDismissed
members.descriptionHtml: A callback function which is called after the Panel is dismissed and the animation is complete.

members.name: onLightDismissClick
members.descriptionHtml: Optional custom function to handle clicks outside the panel in lightdismiss mode

members.name: onOuterClick
members.descriptionHtml: Optional custom function to handle clicks outside this component

members.name: onRenderBody
members.descriptionHtml: Optional custom renderer for body region. Replaces any children passed into the component.

members.name: onRenderFooter
members.descriptionHtml: Optional custom renderer for footer region. Replaces sticky footer.

members.name: onRenderFooterContent
members.descriptionHtml: Custom renderer for content in the sticky footer

members.name: onRenderHeader
members.descriptionHtml: Optional custom renderer for header region. Replaces current title

members.name: onRenderNavigation
members.descriptionHtml: Optional custom renderer navigation region. Replaces the region that contains the close button.

members.name: onRenderNavigationContent
members.descriptionHtml: Optional custom renderer for content in the navigation region. Replaces current close button.

members.name: styles
members.descriptionHtml: Call to provide customized styling that will layer on top of the variant rules.

members.name: theme
members.descriptionHtml: Theme provided by High-Order Component.

members.name: type
members.descriptionHtml: Type of the panel.

members.name: className
members.descriptionHtml: Accept custom classNames

members.name: focusTrapZoneClassName
members.descriptionHtml: Classname for FocusTrapZone element

members.name: hasCloseButton
members.descriptionHtml: Panel has close button

members.name: headerClassName
members.descriptionHtml: Optional parameter to provider the class name for header text

members.name: isAnimating
members.descriptionHtml: Is animation currently running

members.name: isFooterAtBottom
members.descriptionHtml: Determines if content should stretch to fill available space putting footer at the bottom of the page

members.name: isFooterSticky
members.descriptionHtml: Based on state value setting footer to sticky or not

members.name: isHiddenOnDismiss
members.descriptionHtml: Is panel hidden on dismiss

members.name: isOnRightSide
members.descriptionHtml: Is panel on right side

members.name: isOpen
members.descriptionHtml: Is Panel open

members.name: theme
members.descriptionHtml: Theme provided by High-Order Component.

members.name: type
members.descriptionHtml: Type of the panel.

members.name: closeButton
members.descriptionHtml: Style for the close button IconButton element.

members.name: commands
members.descriptionHtml: Style for the navigation container element.

members.name: content
members.descriptionHtml: Style for the body div element.

members.name: contentInner
members.descriptionHtml: Style for the Body and Footer container element.

members.name: footer
members.descriptionHtml: Style for the footer div element.

members.name: footerInner
members.descriptionHtml: Style for the inner footer div element.

members.name: header
members.descriptionHtml: Style for the header container div element.

members.name: headerText
members.descriptionHtml: Style for the header inner p element.

members.name: hiddenPanel
members.descriptionHtml: Style for the hidden element.

members.name: main
members.descriptionHtml: Style for the main section element.

members.name: navigation
members.descriptionHtml: Style for the close button container element.

members.name: overlay
members.descriptionHtml: Style for the overlay element.

members.name: root
members.descriptionHtml: Style for the root element.

members.name: scrollableContent
members.descriptionHtml: Style for the scrollable content area container element.

members.name: custom
members.descriptionHtml: Renders the Panel in `custom` size using `customWidth`, anchored to the far side (right in LTR mode). - Has a fixed width provided by the `customWidth` prop - When screen width reaches the `customWidth` value it will behave like a fluid width Panel taking up 100% of the viewport width

members.name: customNear
members.descriptionHtml: Renders the Panel in `custom` size using `customWidth`, anchored to the near side (left in LTR mode). - Has a fixed width provided by the `customWidth` prop - When screen width reaches the `customWidth` value it will behave like a fluid width Panel taking up 100% of the viewport width

members.name: extraLarge
members.descriptionHtml: Renders the Panel in `extra large` size, anchored to the far side (right in LTR mode). - Small (320-479): adapts to `PanelType.smallFluid` at this breakpoint - Medium (480-639): adapts to `PanelType.smallFixedFar` at this breakpoint - Large (640-1023): adapts to `PanelType.medium` at this breakpoint - XLarge (1024-1365): adapts to `PanelType.large` at this breakpoint - XXLarge (1366-1919): 176px fixed left margin, fluid width, 40px left/right padding - XXXLarge (1920-up): 176px fixed left margin, fluid width, 40px left/right padding

members.name: large
members.descriptionHtml: Renders the Panel in `large` size, anchored to the far side (right in LTR mode). - Small (320-479): adapts to `PanelType.smallFluid` at this breakpoint - Medium (480-639): adapts to `PanelType.smallFixedFar` at this breakpoint - Large (640-1023): adapts to `PanelType.medium` at this breakpoint - XLarge (1024-1365): 48px fixed left margin, fluid width, 32px left/right padding - XXLarge (1366-up): 428px fixed left margin, fluid width, 40px left/right padding

members.name: largeFixed
members.descriptionHtml: Renders the Panel in `large` size, anchored to the far side (right in LTR mode), with a fixed width at XX-Large breakpoint. - Small (320-479): adapts to `PanelType.smallFluid` at this breakpoint - Medium (480-639): adapts to `PanelType.smallFixedFar` at this breakpoint - Large (640-1023): adapts to `PanelType.medium` at this breakpoint - XLarge (1024-1365): 48px fixed left margin, fluid width, 32px left/right padding - XXLarge (1366-up): 940px width, 40px left/right padding

members.name: medium
members.descriptionHtml: Renders the Panel in `medium` size, anchored to the far side (right in LTR mode). - Small (320-479): adapts to `PanelType.smallFluid` at this breakpoint - Medium (480-639): adapts to `PanelType.smallFixedFar` at this breakpoint - Large (640-1023): 592px width, 32px left/right padding - XLarge (1024-1365): 644px width, 32px left/right padding - XXLarge (1366-up): 644px width, 40px left/right padding

members.name: smallFixedFar
members.descriptionHtml: Renders the Panel in fixed-width `small` size, anchored to the far side (right in LTR mode). - Small (320-479): adapts to `PanelType.smallFluid` at this breakpoint - Medium (480-639): 340px width, 16px left/right padding - Large (640-1023): 340px width, 32px left/right padding - XLarge (1024-1365): 340px width, 32px left/right padding - XXLarge (1366-up): 340px width, 40px left/right padding

members.name: smallFixedNear
members.descriptionHtml: Renders the Panel in fixed-width `small` size, anchored to the near side (left in LTR mode). - Small (320-479): 272px width, 16px left/right padding - Medium (480-639): 272px width, 16px left/right padding - Large (640-1023): 272px width, 32px left/right padding - XLarge (1024-1365): 272px width, 32px left/right padding - XXLarge (1366-up): 272px width, 40px left/right padding

members.name: smallFluid
members.descriptionHtml: Renders the Panel with a `fluid` (full screen) width. Recommended for use on small screen breakpoints. - Small (320-479): full screen width, 16px left/right padding - Medium (480-639): full screen width, 16px left/right padding - Large (640-1023): full screen width, 32px left/right padding - XLarge (1024-1365): full screen width, 32px left/right padding - XXLarge (1366-up): full screen width, 40px left/right padding
